price: tó sì ń so èso rẹ̀ ní gbogbo ìgbà pẹ̀lú ìyọ̀ǹda Olúwa rẹ̀? Allāhu ń fún àwọn ènìyàn ní àwọn àkàwé nítorí kí wọ́n lè lo ìrántí.
arabic: تُؤۡتِيٓ أُكُلَهَا كُلَّ حِينِۭ بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهَاۗ وَيَضۡرِبُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡأَمۡثَالَ لِلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: tu'tī ukulahā kulla ḥīnin bi-idh'ni rabbihā wayaḍribu al-lahu al-amthāla lilnnāsi laʿallahum yatadhakkarūna
